Control Name: Protects Personal Information—Policies and procedures have been implemented to protect personal information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Personal Information—Policies and procedures have been implemented to protect personal information from erasure or destruction during the specified retention period of the information.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P4.2 The entity retains personal information consistent with the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
